sys_hub_flow.name: Process WFH Request

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: from the user's manager to WFH
to the requester that their WFH request has been approved!

sys_variable_value.value: Your WFH request has been approved!

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger➛Work From Home Request Record➛Name➛First name,

Your manager has approved your WFH request.

Thank you!

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: break the bad news to the requester :(

sys_variable_value.value: Your WFH request has been rejected.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger➛Work From Home Request Record➛Name➛First name,

Your WFH reqest has been rejected by your manager. Please discuss with your manager before creating a new request.

Thank you!

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: for the Workday admin team to investigate
